website_summaries.verdict: An affordable price tag attracts budget-conscious consumers, but similarly priced bags offer more features.
pros: A multifunction bag with an expandable main storage area

customer_reviews.title: Really like this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Really like this diaper bag, not too big, not too small. It is made of nylon that says waterproof, haven't been in the rain to see, but looks sturdy. Came in orange, pink, blue, gray and the red we picked on Amazon for a reasonable price $25.95, compared to other bags. Really liked the circle pattern. Has lots of pockets to keep organized when you need to grab a certain item. Liked this bag had a zipper, our other bag is open and I am always afraid I will lose something. Overall love this purchase. (Had a different label then Damero, was landuo on tag.)
customer_reviews.author: MamaC

customer_reviews.title: Don't blow your money on the overpriced diaper bag this is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a little girl and a husband who didn't want his own diaper bag but didn't want to be stuck carrying a girly bag around. after a lot of searching and nail biting at the cost of diaper bags I thought this was going to a be a home run or a waste of money. Happy to say it was a home run! Super roomy pockets galore and the clip on strap is plenty long enough to carry this messenger style. I have become a fan of the brand and have also purchased their diaper backpack and again a home run!
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I seriously LOVE this diaper bag. Easy to clean off and POCKETS. I am a first time mom and my son is now 4 months old. I have had tis diaper bag from the beginning and it is AMAZING. It's hold everything that I need and more. And I am very OCD so the pockets are great for organizing. I choose the red because I didn't want my husband to carry around something too feminine and of course I had a son so this is really neutral. I don't really use the over the shoulder strap. I find that it doesn't stay at the place I adjust it too, this is the only down side to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Swank, Sturdy, and Oh So Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is probably one of the best things I ever bought. It STILL gets used as his daily diaper bag even though he's three and been out of diapers for awhile. All the compartments are perfectly designed. It's beautiful, easy to carry, pack, and has the right amount of space for anything you need. I really love this thing. It's been washed many times over and is still as swank as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jaecinta Harris

customer_reviews.title: good functional bad, color is different in person than photo
customer_reviews.text: This bag was thicker nylon than I thought, making it seem very durable. I love the interior pockets with the elastic top to keep things in place. Both front and back pockets on the outside zip and side pockets are big enough for bottles or water bottles. Bag is very functional and can be used for a little amount of items without staying big and bulky, yet expand for a lot of items if needed. The bag seems more bright red, almost pink online with little grey showing, but the true color is equal parts of dark red and dark grey- a little deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: It's very stylish and I like that it is not a stiff fabric
customer_reviews.text: It's very stylish and I like that it is not a stiff fabric, it feels almost like umbrella cloth on the outside. I like the open bay feel in the middle rather than separated sections, I can put anything from a nursing cover to library books inside and feel free to go anywhere. There are plenty of pockets around the inside periphery for diapers, wipes, drinks, etc. This is our fourth child and I really feel this bag gives me everything I need to take all four kids to the park and back.
customer_reviews.author: Home Hearth Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great material!
customer_reviews.text: I did not think that the quality would be so good. This bag is made of strong material just like a heavy duty back pack. I am really hard on my diaper bags but I have high hopes for this one. The only potential problem I might see is the side bottle pockets on the outside of the bag have a leather piece that could break with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The zippers for the outside pockets were missing the 'string or tassel' and could not be used. The drawstrings on the side appear to be made from cut pieces of fake leather and seem rather cheap. This product did come the stroller straps though and is rather large for what I need. I'm in the process of a possible return but after some thought I may keep the bag and a fix my own zipper tassel. I'll update my review if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: TimelessBeauty

customer_reviews.title: perfect diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: lovvvvve this bag. use it as a diaper bag. it's perfect. plenty of pockets. durable (washed several times and nothing has become worn at all). I get compliments on it all the time. size is perfect. just what I was looking for. great bargain
customer_reviews.author: kalispell

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Love the many pockets and the size of bag. I can't believe it's the cheapest I've ever spent on a diaper bag and the one that has made me happiest. It's perfect for my toddler's stuff. I keep a small purse inside to pull out and wear easily when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag...period!
customer_reviews.text: I've had three different diaper bags since my daughter was born. This is #4 and is hands down the best!! Pockets are perfect! Plenty of space in the middle and on the sides. If I could change one thing I would have it open a little wider at the top. The handles easily fit over your shoulder or you can use the extra strap. The stroller straps are a great help! Can't say enough good things about this diaper bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Nice, averaged size diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bag and it's well made, but it is NOT LARGE. The dimensions are listed wrong. The main part of the bag is about 16 inches across and 10 inches tall. Very disappointing. I overnighted it because I need it to pack for a trip but it's actually smaller than the diaper bag I already have. Sigh. That said...I'm keeping it because it really is a nice SMALL diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Roetzel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything and more than I ever wanted. It's made with quality craftmanship at an excellent price. It even brings stroller straps that hold really well and a long strap so you can wear it as a tote. Not too big and not too small and has a decently tall build so you can really pack it up to the top. I even has an insulated pocket inside that holds a warm or cold bottle or cup. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Leeloogalaxy09

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this diaper bag! It's exactly what I was looking for. Great pockets for storage, a keep cold pocket on the inside, large side pockets for my water bottle and kids sippy cups. The bag doesn't feel big and bulky, but it can hold a lot! No I don't think it'll last forever, but for the price I dont need it to. I also bought a JJ Cole diaper bag for twice as much and returned it because I like this one so much more!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a million times better than the expensive diaper bag that I originally bought. This is so light and fits so much. Mine did not come with a changing pad but I had an extra so it didn't matter
customer_reviews.author: K. Wingerson

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a bigger diaper bag that is also efficient with lots of pockets, this is it! I love it and I love how there's a lot of inserts inside. I love the color, too! In addition, like other reviewers have posted, it comes with a hook so it can be attached to your stroller which is a plus for me, especially when going to the zoo or a fair.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine V.

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag !
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been in use for almost a year now, it's durable, always comes clean in the wash, it's cute, not too bulky, yet holds a lot of stuff .. Best price for a good diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila DeFazio

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better quality strap
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a good size. It's nice and roomy. Here's the problem. The sholder strap is like seat belt material. It's very slippery. Not only does it not stay on your sholder, but it also slips out of the length you adjusted it to, so it's always super long. I'm not saying the bag isn't worth it, just be prepared to buy a decent quality strap with a sholder pad for your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I have always been a Petunia Pickle Bottom user and I just switched to this bag. This tote is amazing. It holds EVERYTHING I need and then some. The picture doesn't do it justice, it is a very nice red color. Its light weight and compact but it holds a ton. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: toln519

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight lightweight lightweight! With the same amount of items, this bag feels so much lighter than my Coach diaper bag! Size is pretty big but I was hoping for bigger. Quality is per the price so can't expect too much of it. But overall, it's a great diaper bag that won't hurt your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: AnneW

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and it is very spacious. I haven't finished filling it up. Though am giving it 5 stars I am disappointed that I did not get the drawstring organizer bag it says it was supposed to come with. I am looking at buying another one as a baby shower gift as it is lightweight and roomy. It also looks like good material.
customer_reviews.author: TanDulce

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this bag again and again! Great quality for the low price. Color is like a dark true red. Comes with long strap and the stroller hangers.Plenty of room for even 2 children. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyrc21

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have had countless diaper bags with my four kids. This is the best one yet. It is lightweight, the compartment pockets are so helpful. It has enough room to carry the essentials and more if you want. Easy to find items when looking. Nicely made. Highly recommend this awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: E Staples

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag as a backup diaper bag to the 70$ Skip Hop Chevron Bag and I have to be honest...this product is extremely comparable to the Skip Hop bag! For one, it's a lot roomier than the SH bag, and has many more usable compartments. I just brought it on vacation with my 9mos old and it worked out great! Highly recommend the red!
customer_reviews.author: meredith8584

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I love the scarlet and gray ( go bucks) and all the interior pockets are fantastic! The stroller straps are wonderful! I use them on the stroller of course but also on shopping carts, awesome feature! I just love this bag, great for travel and/or everyday!
customer_reviews.author: SMBS

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag!! I would recommend to anyone. Very large and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag! Perfect size not to big, not too small, light weight! Color is cool darker than picture. Strap doesn't slip from shoulder. Better than a $80 JJ cole that was driving me crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Edna

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's good size and light weight. There is zipper pocket on both side and I can stack bottle for baby or my drink in outside side pocket. I wish the color is more dark pink instead of read like you see in the picture but doesn't look bad at all. I'm happy this purchase and recommend to any one. Much better than diaper bag that you can gind at store gor everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: waka

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Beautiful colors, easy to clean and keep organized. Carries a lot, Not heavy until you fill it with all your gear. Has a nice shoulder strap that is padded and stroller attaccment are included straps as well.
customer_reviews.author: B21

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for the value! Plenty big. I can even fit a blanket inside. Lots of pockets. Deep well. Perfect diaper bag. Or beach tote. Or whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Music_star

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bag ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bag ever!!! I love to stay organized and this bag does just that. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: The quality isn't terrible. I didn't receive the changing pad either that ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag in the mail. The quality isn't terrible. I didn't receive the changing pad either that others said they received. I love that it is so many pockets inside. This being my second child I wanted a bag with as many pockets as possible that way you can easily grab things. I don't like that all product info is in a different language but it was cheap and if it tears up we can just get something else. But if you are looking for a bag that offers some organization than I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty sturdy diaper bag with tons of room
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sturdy diaper bag with tons of room! I travel often and so far it has held up well. I would have rated 5 stars but the shoulder strap is less than par. I actuay switched it out with my messenger bag. In the end, horrible strap but great bag for the $.
customer_reviews.author: ASUblondie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag it can hold everything for my newborn ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag it can hold everything for my newborn and 3 year old plus some of my things I wish I had this bag with my first born
customer_reviews.author: Yasmiyne

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Great value. Even nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This bag is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great bag. The print and fabric are beautiful. It's sturdy and the pockets inside help out so much. Best of all it does not look like a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: michelle martin

customer_reviews.title: Had to retun.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking bag but I had to return because the opening was much more narrow than the dimensions listed on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bifocaled Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my daughter-in-law and she loves it. holds everything she needs for a toddler and infant
customer_reviews.author: Joy B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Red Diaper Tote and it came just as pictured. The size is perfect and it has a great amount of room inside the bag as well as the pockets on the outside. I have used only traditional diaper bags up until purchasing this, and I am in LOVE. The pictures and description are right on the mark and I highly recommend this bag if the colors and patterns suite you.
customer_reviews.author: Kyndra H.

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Stong odor.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a larger diaper bag and this one is definitely on the average to small side. It also has a strong smell out of the package. Durable and cute otherwise. Great for everyday minimalist.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fourth time's a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It's the fourth one I'm trying and definitely am gonna stick with it. It's true that the two drawstring pockets on the end done stay tight but there are enough other pockets that I don't even need to use them. The material is perfect for a diaper bag. The size is big but not too big that I feel ridiculous carrying it. And the stroller handle straps are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Erin L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!! Roomy for multiple children but doesn't look like a diaper bag. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: conoad

customer_reviews.title: Good size and unique patten
customer_reviews.text: Good size and unique patten. I like the variety of strap options - especially the Velcro straps for attaching it to the stroller. They make it so the bag doesn't hit my knees as I'm pushing the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Really loved the bag
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the bag, great size to hold everything and lots of storage pockets inside. Only thing I didn't like was the brown fake leather on the tightening straps on the sides.. it's just doesn't go with the bag. Otherwise, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Parker

customer_reviews.title: This bag is nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This bag is nice and lightweight, and I like the pockets for the most part. I do not understand why the insulated pocket is only insulated on one side, though.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome! All the pockets are great and the room ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! All the pockets are great and the room it has makes this perfect when I'm traveling with my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag was ok but was not as it was advertised. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a few flaws but usable and I needed one asap
customer_reviews.author: Darlene J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag I have a 13 month old and it fits everything including my stuff. The bag is not too big and not too small it's just right and I carry a lot junk. I have looked for a great diaper bag every where but could not find one I took a gamble ordering online and I'm glad I did I highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Richter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for- cute, has lots of pockets, and isn't too big or bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Nice diaper tote
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller than I realized (my fault for not looking at measurements closely) but I love that it has so many pockets to place smaller things and a zip top. I was wanting a sporty style diaper bag that was durable at a reasonable price. This was it at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite diaper bag thus far! Great for two or more kids as well
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: the Red and gray diaper bag was the perfect size I could put alot of items. Alot of pockets as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melymun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Durable material. Just realize it doesn't come with any accessories
customer_reviews.author: Lindsy

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I used it for more than 9 monthes its perfect and really nice with alot of pockets.i travil abroad and use it all time , high recomanded
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with this bag
customer_reviews.text: In love with this bag. I have 3 little ones and i put everything we need in there. Extra clothes, diapers, bottles.... anything a mom needs and "just in case extras". Highly recommend buying it. Husband likes it co it looks gender nautral just in case he needs to bring it with him.
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: great bag! buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a diaper bag! I love the pockets on the inside, that it stands alone, and the durability of it.
customer_reviews.author: SLP Mom

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price for this stylish bag. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price for this stylish bag. I use it hold my Spectra pump and all its parts. There's room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Couch

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for the baby who has everything!! Perfect !!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Super cute, great quality, love all the pockets inside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. I use it for a nursing bag and it has plenty of pockets and it stands up on own. I get a lot of compliments from patients. The large strap is adjustable. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to also keep a couple items for my older daughter
customer_reviews.text: Like this better than my skiphop bag. Very easy to embroider. Took it to a local shop and had them put my son's name on it. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: thePAchick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great back, good looking. Certainly does not look like a cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Raja

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF ROOM
customer_reviews.text: tons of room, many elastic pockets - held absolutely everything I need to carry. Looks great, too.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Going back.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty but not as large as it looks and the dimensions listed are off. But there are plenty of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kanerbug

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my day to day bag. Plenty of pockets for all the little things. Short straps and long straps so depending on how you carry it. It also has stroller straps which are a huge help!Would definitely recommend this bag
customer_reviews.author: Crayner

customer_reviews.title: love it. very handy
customer_reviews.text: everyone compliments me on this bag. love it. very handy
customer_reviews.author: Etj

customer_reviews.title: A great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper tote! Has nice little pockets on the inside for bottles and wipes. Also has three compartments on the outside for bottles and other things. This bag is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carter

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big "diaper bag" fan. I'd rather throw all baby's stuff in my oversized purse and go. But we needed a bag to take enough for a day at the baseball stadium and this bag was absolutely perfect! Lots of storage picked inside and out. Comfortable shoulder and cross-body straps as well as stroller straps includes if needed. It was large enough to carry diapers, wipes, several snacks, 2 water bottles, change of clothes, my own stuff (wallet, keys, cosmetics case, etc), and even a Tula. Highly recommend (and it's great deal at this price)!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Holds everything I need it too and more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bag that is large!!!
customer_reviews.text: Big, cute tote. Used daily as daycare bag for 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: cashew

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this diaper bag! It has so many compartments on the inside to fit all of our baby's things! I've considered buying the bag in every color pattern, that's how much I love this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for five months & the strings around the straps are already starting to fray. Otherwise I love this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H.

customer_reviews.title: I Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I Love this bag! I keep small medicine, 10 diapers, full sized formula, receiving blankets and burp cloths, 2changes of clothes and a light blanket in this bag. I can keep it all fairly organized in the bag because of the conveniently sized pockets, plus I like the pattern, so does my husband!
customer_reviews.author: s o

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and perfect price I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rubio

customer_reviews.title: My youngest is over a year old now and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: My youngest is over a year old now and I'm still using this bag. It's very roomy and has enough pockets to hold all the items I need to bring with me when I go out with my three kids.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: I received it yesterday in the mail and it love it even better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: I received it yesterday in the mail and it love it even better than the picture! Love the color and all the space.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: No changing pad.....the only let down.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that would make this bag better is a changing pad included!!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Toussaint

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, durable, many compartments and light weight. Using for international flights and loving it.
customer_reviews.author: RKSF

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy carrying this stylish
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy carrying this stylish, convenient bag! It's enough room for me & baby's things. The multiple compartments make organization a breeze & access easy while on the move. I recommend this bag to every mommy & daddy!
customer_reviews.author: Maya Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: I like it, for it does not look exactly as ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, for it does not look exactly as moms bag - it can be worn even without kid in hand :)..
customer_reviews.author: Tamta

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have our bag packed and ready to go to the hospital! Had plenty of room for everything, plus rim for extras! Many pockets inside the bag and 2 lare zipper pickets outside the bag. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Natisha Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: Roomy Carry All Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this roomy bag. Lots of pockets. Soft flexibility makes it easy to carry on shoulder or around neck. I carry for myself a toddler and a baby all in one bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I have 3 kids under 2 and it fits everything I need and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Diaz

customer_reviews.title: awesome and cute bag
customer_reviews.text: I just brought home baby number 7. That being said I've had a few diaper bags. This is my favorite one! I love all the pockets and places to put stuff. I usually throw more than one kids stuff into one diaper bag and this bag let me organize it with the pockets. The inside is waterproof so that when something spills, like a juice box, it won't make a huge yucky mess that I can't clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan misfit

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Nice sturdy metal parts and lots of pockets. Also a nice design!
customer_reviews.author: Juhi

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for an excellent price! Lightweight, pretty coloring, lots of pockets, cross body strap is a nice feature. A++
customer_reviews.author: NAZ31

customer_reviews.title: But good product with number of pockets that will sever the ...
customer_reviews.text: Color is not as expected . But good product with number of pockets that will sever the purpose
customer_reviews.author: Chandana

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean with lots of pockets and zipper compartments
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to clean with lots of pockets and zipper compartments!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great. It is nice and light and has a ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. It is nice and light and has a lot of space. I was worried it would be too big but with two little kids it fits everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Milana N.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this bag, no other diaper for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. I got the red and gray one. It fits everything perfectly, lots of room without it being overly big. TONS OF ORGANIZAION! I love that I use it as a cross body bag too, and it comes with additional straps, which I would assume would be for the stroller to hang it off the back. I will only use this bag, and I highly recommend it for those looking for a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn V

customer_reviews.title: A great bag!
customer_reviews.text: A great bag!! Holds a lot, but not obnoxious in size. Very affordable! I'll probably by another next season, just for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. It met all my exoectations. It even came with the extra long strap .
customer_reviews.author: Cort

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as large a bag as expected. The color is more red than pink.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag and the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag and the price! I bought this as a back up diaper bag and ended up using it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Megham Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, and still using this bag more than ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, and still using this bag more than a year later! I'm so so very pleased with the price and the purchase all together!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag. Definitely is big enough for one kiddo and is cute. It is still kind of hard to keep organized as is softer material but there are lots of pockets. I dont really use the larger shoulder strap as it is clunky and black (doesn't really match the bag).
customer_reviews.author: Erickson

customer_reviews.title: The best bag I've purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 other Diaper bags before this one and this one is by far my favorite! Great quality, looked exactly like the description and picture. I have a 2 year old and another baby on the way, which is great because you can put A LOT of stuff in this bag. The 2 sets of straps are great to have too. I definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Everything Looked Good Until Further Inspection
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived in clear cellophane packaging; new with tags. The pockets and side zippers were exactly what I was looking for. I had plans to use this as a dance bag for my daughter. Zippers worked fine and all seemed well! Until I noticed a 4.5" split opening along one of the seams of the bag. For the cost of the product, I could not justify keeping the bag and fixing it myself. Retuning this one and keeping my eyes out for a better quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: MjLole

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, large and kid-friendly material and design.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a diaper bag expert at this point. After two daughters and an obsessive love of handbags, I've tried all the top brands. And this bag is in my top 2. It's lightweight, it's big but not "duffle bag size" (my husband's complaints on some of the others). It holds enough for my 2 year and infant for a full day on the go and it has a good number of interior pockets but still ample open space in the middle for my wristlet purse, snacks and iPad. I just wish it was available in solid/bold colors. At this reasonable price, I'd buy two more just to coordinate with the seasons/outfits.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyF

product_meta.title: Damero Large Diaper Tote Satchel Bag with Drawstring Organizer Bag (Red)
product_meta.description: This diaper bag has much room for everything without looking silly when not as full for errands or a quick trip. Can be packed with tons of stuff for a longer day out too.it is very nice and silky yet strong, waterproof material and the color is fashion . and this item is a good idea for baby shower gifts. This Stylish and functional diaper bag also can be used a daily casual women shoulder bag. It comes with one "Damero" DRAWSTRING ORGANIZER BAG.
feature_bullets: Waterproof Nylon Diaper Bag, particular colorful designer with "Damero" Drawstring Organizer Bag
Expandable center makes bag 20% larger, 7 small insulated interior pockets: one pocket special for bottle warmer, 2 for nappy or baby clothes
4 exterior pockets:one zipper on the front and another one on the back with waterproof lining, 2 bottle pockets on each side with drawstring
Size: L14''*W6.5''*H11.5'', Light Weight only 0.4kg, removable, adjustable padded shoulder strap.
Multi function, hangs neatly on a stroller and can be worn over the shoulder. This Stylish and functional diaper bag also can be used a daily casual women shoulder bag.
